properties.areaDesc: Galveston Island and Bolivar Peninsula; Matagorda Islands; Brazoria Islands
properties.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued January 21 at 9:35PM CST until January 23 at 1:00AM CST by NWS Houston/Galveston TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Along Gulf facing beaches...minor coastal flooding with
wave run up during high tides on Wednesday afternoon. Tide
levels could reach around 3.5ft MLLW at high tide. Strong
southeast winds will also cause strong rip currents.

* WHERE...Matagorda Islands, Brazoria Islands and Galveston
Island and Bolivar Peninsula.

* WHEN...From Wednesday morning through late Wednesday night.

* IMPACTS...Rip currents will make swimming hazardous. Minor coastal
flooding to Highway 87 on Bolivar Peninsula and other Gulf
facing beaches is possible.
properties.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions.

NWSheadline: BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM CST WEDNESDAY THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT
